title: league ranked broke????
body:
So i played a League ranked game with my friend we dou'd, we won but then i saw no points were added to my score and i checked my game history and i saw it didn't show up there either.

Please help.

replies.body: Same Just played  A ranked Promo game. Should have ranked up but did not. Did not receive points, rank up and no history. The end match stats never came up also.
Same to me

The same thing happened to me, riot please fix it! I was supposed to rank up to silver 5 but it didn't record my last two wins in my series, in result didn't move me up. It's still claiming I only have 1 win in series.

I came to this forum to report same incident happening to me, I finished a game was supposed to become gold 4 but at end of the game I was thrown into my previous lost game screen and showed that I only played two of my provisional games when I was supposed to have just won the 3rd game
would really love to see something be done and a notification of points being added
just happened here too duo no history or after match screen pop...where are my points... funny I just bought a skin too{{champion:268}}

I just won a very long hard fought ranked match and after the victory it kicked me into the end game chat of the previous game I had. The game I had just won doesn't show up in my history. That was such a hard fight and a huge come from behind victory. I will be very disappointed if I don't get credit for it!
I am having this problem too.
This just happened to me right now also, won a ranked game, nothing showed up on the history or results. What is going on? Thats time I spent playing.. want to see it fixed and given my win
I should be in my series and it hasnt updated and im not in my series. 4 years and they still cant get their servers right.

> I should be in my series and it hasnt updated and im not in my series. 4 years and they still cant get their servers right.

same thing happening to me right now
same thing happened to me and im supposed to be in promos right now. WTF
exact same thing happened to me and this isnt the first time.

Im in que with my Duo at champ select, the game then shows me stats, says i qualified and then i get kicked from the champ select because i didnt get to pick a champion. Resulting in a loss in my series. So now I'm screwed. 

COME ON RIOT!
Same here, won a match and i didn't get points and it doesn't show in history.
Same here, won a match and i didn't get points and it doesn't show in history.
Yeah just played an hour long game and won. It should have put me into plat 2, but it doesn't even show on my match history.
Same thing happened to me...

So I wrote a support ticket about this. Just get those info and send in a support ticket.



Here is their response:

I'm sorry to hear that your game may have not registered with our system. This problem is sometimes the result of a player in your game "drop-hacking." or the issue may stem from deeper system troubles. The good news is that I can definitely look into this for you! Unfortunately, we're unable to provide any LP for games lost this way. 

I'll need a few things from you for my investigation: 

-That game's r3d log - this will show me a history of the game as seen by your computer. Make sure to pull the r3d log from that game only, please! 

https://riotgames.zendesk.com/entries/27495980#wq7 

-A list of players and which Champions they were playing - this helps me check the trends of player matches to spot potential "drop-hackers." If you can only remember your Champion, that'll still help us to try and find the game. 

-The time of the game in question - try to be as specific as possible.

Have the same issue here. 
But when I click on detailed history match, I can see the match.
Same thing happened to me

This actually happened to my ranked games as well. The weird thing is, my match history from the website is correct for my ranked games, however it doesn't show in my league client.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA/33633352

I'm missing the most recent Amumu game, which is upsetting since it went so well.
Missing ranked match here too!

If you have just won a ranked match and the match has not shown any of the stats or history on your client, and it has not given you LP for the victory, then to fix it go and create a custom match, as soon as you go in to the champion selection, the client should show you the last ranked win that you were supposed to have gotten but never did. If it doesn't show up then just quickly play the custom and push to the nexus to end the game. Allowing it to reset and show the ranked matches in your history client wise.
They won't do shit. Ignoring problems until it gets extremely bad, then not repaying the players is what riot does best.
same problem i'm hoping they'll give back the lost LP and IP even if IP is less important

Sigh, same thing here.  Won the game with ease, last game of promo series and was ready to rank up......nope.  Waiting for stats.  This happened earlier and I skipped the stats and 4 minutes later I was notified I was in promos, while trying to pick a champ for the next game...

I really hope I don't have to replay the last game of the promo.....again....{{summoner:3}}
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/9sgM2wvB-fix-for-ranked-matches-not-showing-up-or-giving-lp
I'm sure riot is doing everything they can at the moment, but when things happen like this 80% of the time you will never get the LP they will just fix the problem.
same with me
Seem that if you do a regular or ARAM after this it updates. Stupid but i would not do another rank till you get it to update.
Same thing happened to me~~~~

This just happened to me. I won a game and it gave 0lp and no end game stats and the match doesn't show up in my history. since this is the 2nd or 3rd time this has happened to me in the last month do they even know what keeps causing this bug?

same bug happened

plz help me too
**Same here!**
Just happened to me... Good to know Riot has been talking to users... /s

This just happened to me...we played a normal game after the first game that disappeared and then on the stats screen after the game, our PREVIOUS game's stats came up and it hit me the loss for that game, but the game we JUST played is now not showing up. Can we get a red post?
same thing happened to me!
Riot server always got problem these day.  Whats wrong with you guys?  Only care about earning money$$  ????
I was playing with my team in provisionals and we won all 5 yet we received no rank.  On the LoL web page it shows the match it just hasn't updated in the online LoL servers.

This just happened to me too. I had won a game about 20 minutes ago and the stats never  came up. I left and came back to que for another game and all of a sudden during the middle of champion select the stats of the previous game popped up. Had to leave my que because I couldn't even champion select.

Same. What is going on? Won my game as a duo, stats were taking FOREVER to load, so I skipped.

Now the match isn't in my history, nor do I have the IP or LP from it.

Please don't tell me I wasted my time....
were all in the same boat. but it just updated.
Same thing just happened to me and my Duo.
